All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Cancellation
The Cancellation class
ConstantReferences
This class holds values for different useful methods that can be changed from this file and will be changed everywhere in the code.
DataAnalysis
This class calculates several metrics based off of the reservations and cancellations csv files This class is abstract and all the methods are static since instances are not needed to calculate the various metrics.
Hotel
The hotel class defines the hotel and its info
HotelGUI
This is the main driver of the GUI version of the reservation system.
HotelInitialiser
The HotelInitialiser class reads hotel and room data from a specified file, creates appropriate Hotel and TypeOfRoom objects and stores them in a list to be further processed later on.
InputScanner
 
InputValidator
 
PrintedMenus
This class is necessary to print the menu that allows the user to see which options one might have.
Reader
The reader classes has methods that will read the contents of files and convert them into Reservation and/or Cancellation objects.
Reservation
The Reservation class defines and stores a reservation
ReservationCancellationManager
This class keeps track of all the reservations, cancellations and users and provides numerous functionalities for these lists.
ReservationSystem
 
Room
class Room defines a room
SystemMain
This class uses ReservationSystem which brings up the command line interface with all the menus and sub menus so that the project can be run.
TypeOfRoom
class typeOfRoom defines room types
User
This class is a blueprint for creating a user.
Writer
The Writer class writes both reservations and cancellations
